Reviews.Title: “Good stay and afordable”
Reviews.Author: christopher p Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed 4 22th feb loved properly everytime quiet city centre self found realy easy bus wich road massive vegans dint choise breackfast apart bread jam lot selection friut soya milk

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Friendly..would stay again”
Reviews.Author: redjoker
Reviews.Content: read lots hotel alittle unsure price convinced book im glad traveled termini station stuck hotel save time taxi 13 found station wrong offered huge bus terminal 90 60 euro arrival staff lovely clean tidy shabby nicely surprised evening walk local found family run resturant lovely bars sat hotel terrace drinks lovely breakfast nice arnt breakfast eaters hotel lots info getting town 2 min walk 60 bus 1 euro 75 min travel centre busy ride worth found ourselves getting taxis home mainly wine drank overall clean friendly stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean and spacious room”
Reviews.Author: Karibel
Reviews.Content: stayed sunrise hotel boyfriend 4 daughter beginning november bus ciampino airport cost €4 half hour reach termini 90 bus bit tricky people friendly helpful bus 20min stops operating midnight careful triple spacious clean locker personal belongings staffs hotel friendly breakfast morning varied plentiful arrived hotel female didnt feel 100 safe hotel market people builders kept shouting whistling found intimidating wifi wasn’t free hotel internet cafe bottom stairs market stalls id enjoyed stay sunrise hotel definitely

Reviews.Title: “A very warm welcome from the man with a goatie beard!”
Reviews.Author: Honeymooners43
Reviews.Content: wife frequent visitors rome city time hotel occasion middle noisy polluted centre rome restful weeks holiday bit nice view vegitation appreciate city hotel joy despite euro annoyingly expensive time pretty deal paid warmly welcomed beard helpful lady desk week helpful soon home thank hotel providing gideon bible speak means lot easily carry bible travels honest opinion didnt staff weekend helpful wouldnt rate bad hotel suggest fresh fruit juice breakfast idea course nomentana traffic slower rome frequent buses town quick anyway wherever stay city time

Reviews.Title: “Okay if you just want to sleep there.”
Reviews.Author: rachelsmemom
Reviews.Content: found family size inadequate 4 people sit unwind day eat service 15 round table 2 chairs decor tired dirty smells cigarette smoke front desk staff helpful redeemed hotel

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Hedli
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel staff friendly helpful fine albeit decor little tired word warning dont smell cigarettes dont emphasise nonsmoking friends obviously smokers despite leaving windows reek cigarette smoke stayed breakfast ok coffee selfserve machine pretty ordinary restaurants easy walking distance hostaria standout sunday night lasagne special hotel 2030 minutes depending time day travel local bus centre rome buses plentiful close slight inconvenience worth youre paying fortune hotel

Reviews.Title: “Ideal but beware of the staff suite !”
Reviews.Author: DurhamCouple2
Reviews.Content: visited sunrise sunflower hotel towels welcome mats hotel mid 2010 eventually finding local booked 24 hour staff book facilities seen trip adviser sites rates £70 night 2 including breakfast shown strange outside main door shown absolutely fine perfectly clean hotel appeared staff connected private main reception door didnt bother slept bother people found hotel italy tea coffee facilities nice apart hotel lovely 5 minutes walk steps local shops range delis markets cafes available recommend via nomentana little cafe left fantastic range coffes 150 euro 3 hotel little deli called water fresh local prepared pasta 3 4 euro portion pizza 10 euro kilo lovely local rice balls 80 cents ball served lovely local couple patient poor italian ignore people travel centre rome termini 25 minutes crowded busy days buses run 10 minutes recommend 90 buy ticket onboard door otherwise tourist bus pass roma pass unlimited travel throughout rome 3 days valid soon validate time stamp onboard buses overall hotel imaculately clean bedding towels changed day breakfast huge slightly limited arrive 830 staff particularly friendly pleasant hotel nice location definately recommend ourselves

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location lovely staff”
Reviews.Author: alisonemillar
Reviews.Content: im checking tripadvisor hotel write review found hotel via adults 7 days value rome arrival ciampino airport terravision bus outside booth airport book online price 4 euros directly termini centre rome termini bus goes round bus 90 road past look spot bought ticket newspaper kiosk machine bus 1 euro ticket 1 euro ticket valid 75 mins buying ticket midnight unlimited journeys 4 euros validate ticket machine bus inspector buses advised 90 buses frequent bus journey takes 2540 mins traffic dependant stop bridge via nomentana straight road easiest follow road round past street market stalls past cafe hand left hand restaurant called hostaria lovely staff menu roman italian dishes newspaper stall directly opposite restaurant steps sunrise left top met lovely staff spoke english helpful floor spacious spotlessly clean breakfast 710 nice buffet style 16 euros basement level wifi 20 euros week unlimited connection nearby shops chemist supermarkets market fresh fruit veg bus stops street nearby square signs direction buses stops usually 60 60 90 frequent centre piazza venezia walking distance days roma football match easy using buses fairly quickly town bus system rome english route planner online helpful day cooking course le fate trastevere highly recommended review tripadvisor found value eating set menus 1214 euros tips 1 learn bit italian people speak english helps 2 drinks top museum piazza venezia massive monument vittorio emanuele ii wonderful view free cafe definitely stay hotel
